trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Huawei NE20S2:BgpPeerRemoteAs[{#SNMPVALUE}].regexp({$BGP_PEER_AS})}=0 and {Template Huawei NE20S2:BgpPeerState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(#3)}<>6 and {Template Huawei NE20S2:BgpPeerAdminStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}=2 and {Template Huawei NE20S2:asname["{#SNMPVALUE}","{HOST.CONN}"].strlen()}>-1
trigger_prototype.name: BGP peer {ITEM.VALUE4} ({#SNMPVALUE})

trigger.name: CPU USAGE {$SNMPVALUE} is HIGH
trigger.description: Trigger for CPU USAGE higher than 80%.
